about_the_game:
The middle of the 23rd Century. A space probe detects unusual energy readings from the asteroid 2060 Chiron. A crewed follow-up mission detects a million-year-old artefact buried beneath the asteroid's surface. A ring of exotic matter that bends space and gravity. A Gate, which when activated could lead anywhere in the galaxy...

EXPLORE BEYOND THE GATE

Beyond the Chiron Gate is a text-based space exploration roguelike. Explore an endless universe filled with exotic planets, strange life forms, and ancient civilisations. Manage a crew of space explorers and upgrade their ship with new technology. Brave dangerous worlds to gather the data you need to reach the home system of the mysterious Gatebuilders.

FEATURES

  • Randomly-generated universe where no two games are the same.
  • Over a hundred random events including perils on strange worlds, encounters with life and civilisations, and your explorers' emotional journeys.
  • Multi-layered exploration where discoveries reveal more things to explore.
  • Dozens of ship upgrades including scanners, defences, crew capacity increases, and new abilities.
  • Six explorer classes that unlock new options in events. Explorers level up, can be injured or die, and can become inspired or depressed.
  • Death is permanent. Take too many risks and the mission is over - start again in a new universe.
  • Post-victory endless mode.
  • Over an hour of atmospheric space music.

FROM THE CREATOR OF SEEDSHIP

Beyond the Chiron Gate is the spiritual successor to the viral hit web/mobile game Seedship. Go beyond the Seedship's mission and explore a larger, more detailed universe.
